== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Chi;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03a7/index.htm U+003A7].
  * `&chi;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03c7/index.htm U+003C7].
